```{r}
library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE, warn.conflicts = FALSE )
my_model <- lm(cyl ~ hp, data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cyl, hp))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm")+
  xlim(c(-1,5))
```

```{r}
my_model2 <- lm(mpg ~ hp + gear + carb + cyl, data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
summary(my_model2)
```

```{r}
my_model3 <- lm(gear ~ cyl + mpg + carb + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(my_model3)
```

```{r}
my_model3 <- lm(cyl ~ gear + mpg + carb + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(my_model3)
```

```{r}
my_model3 <- lm(carb ~ cyl + mpg + gear + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(my_model3)
```

```{r}
my_model3 <- lm(hp ~ cyl + mpg + carb + gear, data = mtcars)
summary(my_model3)
```

```{r}
test <- mtcars %>%
  slice_sample(n=10)
```

```{r}
predict(my_model3, newdata = test)
```

```{r}
my_data2 <- data.frame(x=predict(my_model3),y=mtcars$hp)
```

```{r}
my_data2$difencia <- my_data2$x-my_data2$y
```

```{r}
my_data2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(difencia))+
  geom_density()
```
